EmailTemplate.subject: RE: TWC payment terms (1343059445.0)
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
- - - Clean Clean false false false EN-US X-NONE X-NONE Hi Kevin, It really is – I was so thrilled when this came across my desk! No other updates as of now. Welcome back!Sara From: Kevin McCarron [mailto:projects@kevinmccarron.com] Sent: Monday, July 23, 2012 11:35 AM To: Sara Conde Subject: Re: TWC payment terms This is great news and great progress.
I've just returned from a week away - any other updates?
Thanks! KevinOn Thu, Jul 19, 2012 at 5:48 PM, Sara Conde <sconde@mbopartners.com <mailto:sconde@mbopartners.com>> wrote:Hi Kevin,
See below as an FYI net terms for TWC are changing from net 30 to net 15 (woo-hoo!)
Thanks, Sara
-----Original Message----- From: Hill, Chris [mailto:CHill@weather.com <mailto:CHill@weather.com>] Sent: Thursday, July 19, 2012 4:23 PM To: Sara Conde Subject: terms
i have gotten approval to move MBO to Net-15. should take effect in the next check run.
chris
-- Kevin McCarron Founder, Designer & Strategist
Projection Creative | m 404.697.4470 <http://404.697.4470> | kevinmccarron.com <http://kevinmccarron.com>
